columns.name: id
columns.constraints: PRIMARY KEY GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
columns.description: Unique identifier for each user

columns.name: password
columns.description: Hashed password for authentication

columns.name: last_login
columns.description: The date and time of the user's last login

columns.name: email
columns.description: The user's email address

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Indicates whether the user's account is active

columns.name: date_joined
columns.description: The date and time when the user registered

columns.name: social_provider
columns.description: The social provider used for registration (e.g., google, apple, facebook, none)

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the user (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE, BLOCKED)

columns.name: role
columns.description: The role of the user (e.g., SUPER_ADMIN, ADMIN, USER)

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the user was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the user was last updated

columns.name: full_name
columns.description: The user's full name

columns.name: id
columns.constraints: PRIMARY KEY GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
columns.description: Unique identifier for each user

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: The user's id

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: The user's phone number

columns.name: address
columns.description: The user's address

columns.name: profile_picture
columns.description: The user's profile picture

columns.name: salary
columns.description: The user_info's salary per month

report_time.description: Contains information about report time of a user in a day

columns.name: id
columns.constraints: PRIMARY KEY GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL
columns.description: Unique identifier for each report time

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: The user's id

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The start time of the report time

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The end time of the report time

columns.name: duration
columns.description: Total working hours of the user in a day (in hours)

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the report time

relationships.name: user_to_user_info
relationships.description: One user can have one user info

relationships.name: user_to_report_time
relationships.description: One user can have many report times. The report time is the time that the user worked in a day
